high_descs: Pick up a candle from the tub
Place the candle on top of the toilet
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from a tub to a toilet

high_descs: Turn left and head to the wall then turn right and go to the bath tub
Pick up the candle from the edge of the bath tub
Turn right, then turn right and head to the garbage bin next to the toilet
Put the candle on the toilet tank lid
anns.task_desc: Move the candle from the bath tub to the toilet tank lid

high_descs: pick up the candle from the tub basin
take the candle to the toilet
put the candle on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: take the candle from the tub to the toilet.
